titles.title: A bill to extend until November 15, 1987, the provision of law requiring the continuation of health benefits for retired former employees in certain bankruptcies.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 4/1/1987--Introduced. Amends the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and Related Agencies Appropriation Act, 1987 to extend to November 15, 1987, the provision of law requiring the continuation of health benefits for retired former employees in certain bankruptcies.
